mapper.select: select i.no, i.title, i.content, i.id, m.name, i.writeDate, i.fileName from tbl_imageboard i, tbl_member m where (no = #{no}) and (m.id = i.id)
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_imageboard(no, title, content, id, fileName) values(seq_imageboard.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{id}, #{fileName})
